title: groke
author: groke
content: hi everyoneI have the  GekkoScience FS7 Compact, problems I have is the slow speeds I am currently using a Usb 3.0 hub which I am trying the miner with I have  read there are some issues with using some USb 3.0 hubs wanted to ask the community if that is one of the issues with using Usb 3.0 hub. find screen shots attached, looks like a it`s not powering all minershttps://imgur.com/a/kHV7XzHthanks in advanced to everyone taking time to look at my post really appreciate it groke

comments.author: gt_addict
comments.body: Take a look at the dedicated thread for the stick here:-https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5355470.0A regular usb hub without external power is a waste of time with these sticks. Really you want the Gekko Hub to be able to get these sticks running well
